As long as this card is attached to a Pokémon, it provides {C} Energy. \n\nWhen you attach this card from your hand to a Pokémon, search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

As long as this card is attached to a Pokémon, it provides {P} Energy.\n\nIf the {P} Pokémon this card is attached to is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an opponent’s attack (even if it is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.
As long as this card is attached to a Pokémon, it provides {L} Energy. \n\nWhen you attach this card from your hand to a {L} Pokémon, draw 2 cards.

As long as this card is attached to a Pokémon that isn't a Pokémon V or a Pokémon-GX, it provides {C}{C} Energy. \n\nIf this card is attached to a Pokémon V or a Pokémon-GX, it provides {C} Energy instead.
If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, flip a coin. If heads, the Attacking Pokémon is Knocked Out.

If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an opponent’s attack (even if it is Knocked Out), choose a random card from your opponent’s hand. Your opponent reveals that card and puts it on the bottom of their deck.
This Pokémon can evolve during your first turn or the turn you play it.
Once during your turn, you may put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. If you placed any damage counters in this way, shuffle this Pokémon and all attached cards into your deck.
All of your Pokémon take 30 less damage from your opponent’s attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance). You can’t apply more than 1 Big Shield Ability at a time.

As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent’s Active Pokémon’s attacks cost {C} more.
Once during your turn, you may flip a coin. If heads, switch 1 of your opponent’s Benched Basic Pokémon with their Active Pokémon.

You must discard 2 cards from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may search your deck for a Galarian Perrserker, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
If a Stadium is in play, this Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.
Once during your turn, you may search your deck for a Pokémon Tool card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may put a Supporter card from your discard pile into your hand.
As often as you like during your turn, you may attach a {W} Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Benched {W} Pokémon.
If this Pokémon has full HP, it takes 60 less damage from your opponent’s attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
If any damage is done to this Pokémon by attacks, flip a coin. If heads, prevent that damage.
All of your Pokémon that have "Falinks" in their name take 20 less damage from your opponent’s attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may flip a coin. If heads, put a Supporter card from your discard pile into your hand.
Once during your turn, you may use this Ability. Each player discards a card from their hand. (Your opponent discards first.)
As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent’s Pokémon in play have no Abilities, except for Neutralizing Gas.
When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may put an Energy attached to your opponent’s Active Pokémon on top of their deck.
All of your Pokémon that have Energy attached have no Weakness.
Prevent all effects of your opponent's attacks, except damage, done to all of your Pokémon that have Energy attached. (Existing effects are not removed.)
This Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Your {M} Pokémon’s attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks (both yours and your opponent’s).
Once during your turn, you may attach a {R} Energy card, a {F} Energy card, or 1 of each from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like.
Once during your turn, if you drew this Pokémon from your deck at the beginning of your turn and your Bench isn't full, before you put it into your hand, you may put it onto your Bench.
If this Pokémon has a Burning Scarf attached, it gets +100 HP.
The Pokémon this card is attached to gets +30 HP.
Switch 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon.
If the {R} Pokémon this card is attached to is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an opponent’s attack (even if it is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Burned.
Search your deck for up to 2 {W} Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
If the Pokémon this card is attached to is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent’s attack, discard the top 2 cards of your opponent’s deck.
Draw 2 cards. You and your opponent play Rock-Paper-Scissors until someone wins. If you win, draw 2 more cards.
Your Active Pokémon recovers from all Special Conditions.
The Retreat Cost of both Active Pokémon is {C}{C} more.
Discard up to 2 cards from your hand, and draw 2 cards for each card you discarded in this way.

product.sm.leaguebattledeck.pikachuzekro: Lightning leaps and thunder crashes when you have Pikachu, Zekrom, and Raichu on your side! This fully charged League Battle Deck is loaded with power cards and major Pokémon, all the better to step up your game into the big time. In this complete deck, you’ll find 3 Pokémon-GX and a full set of supporting accessories to play a Lightning-type blitz the way it should be played—stunningly fast and extra effective!
product.sm.leaguebattledeck.reshiramchar: Flames dance and fire leaps at your command when you have Reshiram, Charizard, and Braixen on your side! This fast-burning League Battle Deck is loaded with power cards and major Pokémon, all the better to step up your game into the big time. In this complete deck, you’ll find 3 Pokémon-GX and a full set of supporting accessories to play with fire the way it should be played—blazingly fast and extra hot!
product.swsh2.pcd.zacian.name: Zacian Theme Deck
product.swsh2.pcd.zacian.sell-text: Sharp and quick, the Legendary Pokémon Zacian leads its mighty companions to victory! With Unfezant holding the skies and Professor’s Research keeping your options open, you have a full range of paths to reach the top. Galarian Perrserker and Hawlucha lend their courage as you wield the Zacian theme deck with valor!
product.swsh2.pcd.zacian.tagline: Zacian Brings an Edge to Your Game!
product.swsh2.pcd.zamazenta.name: Zamazenta Theme Deck
product.swsh2.pcd.zamazenta.sell-text: Strong as any shield, the Legendary Pokémon Zamazenta and a group of Pokémon warriors are ready to battle! Duraludon gets you powered up quickly, and Professor’s Research ensures your hand stays full of options. Corviknight and Ferrothorn add steely determination as you keep the Zamazenta theme deck focused and on target!
